body_text: Please come home, we miss you very much.
You are a rotten human being.
Don't make me turn this car around.
They should lock you up for your crimes.
Don't make me come over there.
I don't think this is legal.
Ok great, that's great, please stop.
Do you really think this kind of thing is ok?
I'm so sick you seeing you, please delete your account.
